page.title: 07SHOPPING IN OUR AREA
page.content: When we did a survey on where most people did their weekly shopping,we found that most people shopped at Asda they shopped there mostly once a week.The next popular was the Co-op then Kwick-Save then finally Sainsburys.Nobody shopped twice a week at the Co-op or Sainsburys.A lot of people go to the Harrows pub off-licence for sweets or a bottle of pop.Some people go to the Bungalow shop or the Jet garage if the Newsagents is closed.A lot of girls and boys from about 11-16 year olds go to Lincoln on saturdays to get things like new shoes etc.as there are not a lot of choice of clothes or shoes in Hykeham.Some older people may only go to Lincoln three or four times a year. I think that another clothes shop would improve Hykeham village.
